tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE digital_nomads_contact_information (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    full_name VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(50),
    phone_number VARCHAR(15),
    location VARCHAR(100),
    skills JSON,
    interests JSON
);

CREATE TABLE contacts (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(50),
    location VARCHAR(100),
    skills VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE connections (
    from_id INT,
    to_id INT,
    connection_date DATE,
    connection_type VARCHAR(50),
    PRIMARY KEY (from_id, to_id, connection_date)
);

CREATE TABLE nomads_contacts (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    fullname VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(50),
    job_title VARCHAR(50),
    location VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE nomads_interests (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    interest VARCHAR(50),
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES nomads_contacts(id)
)

CREATE TABLE nomads_connections (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    connection_id INT,
    status VARCHAR(20),
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES nomads_contacts(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (connection_id) REFERENCES nomads_contacts(id)
)

CREATE TABLE digital_nomads_contacts (
    contact_id INT,
    first_name VARCHAR(50),
    last_name VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    location VARCHAR(100),
    PRIMARY KEY (contact_id)
)

CREATE TABLE networking_events (
    event_id INT,
    event_name VARCHAR(100),
    event_date DATE,
    location VARCHAR(100),
    organizer VARCHAR(50),
    PRIMARY KEY (event_id)
)

CREATE TABLE coworking_spaces (
    space_id INT,
    space_name VARCHAR(100),
    location VARCHAR(100),
    capacity INT,
    amenities VARCHAR(200),
    PRIMARY KEY (space_id)
)

CREATE TABLE digital_nomad_groups (
    group_id INT,
    group_name VARCHAR(100),
    location VARCHAR(100),
    group_type VARCHAR(50),
    description TEXT,
    PRIMARY KEY (group_id)
)

CREATE TABLE message_history (
    message_id INT,
    sender_id INT,
    receiver_id INT,
    message_text TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    PRIMARY KEY (message_id)
)
